programme.title: Leverage: Redemption S2
programme.desc: Eliot returns to his hometown and discovers that the runoff from an oil fracking company is now poisoning the water; the crew plots to take down the powerful man behind it all.

programme.title: The Good Karma Hospital S1
programme.desc: Lydia and Ruby visit a convent to make a seemingly miraculous diagnosis, but the senior doctor's interfering attitude creates tension between them, Maggie and Paul join a group of pilgrims on a trek through the jungle, hoping to find the answer to her prayers.

programme.title: America's Got Talent: Extreme
programme.desc: America's Got Talent: Extreme is an American reality television and talent competition series created by Simon Cowell. The series is a spinoff of America's Got Talent that focuses on stunt performers. Showcasing the most outrageous, unique and jaw-dropping acts of enormous scale and magnitude that simply can't be confined to a theater stage.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S5
programme.desc: Nature is a tempestuous beast, capable of destruction on a level so devastating and claimed the lives of millions. In recent years, these extreme weather events have become more and more commonplace. Using incredible archive and astonishing user-generated footage of some of the most extraordinary weather the planet has ever seen, we'll relive these weather spectacles in astonishing minute by minute detail, revealing very personal stories of people who have captured the entire event on camera.

programme.title: Monster Jam
programme.desc: Professional monster truck drivers compete against each other in races and freestyle competitions around the world to win the top prize.

programme.title: Unbelievable Moments Caught On Camera S6
programme.desc: Voiced by Alexander Armstrong, the programme travels around the globe - meeting the people who filmed these amazing clips to get the stories behind the footage. Unbelievable Moments Caught on Camera features incredible, eye-witness footage shot by members of the public.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Mat Yoyo: The New Generation
programme.desc: Kim asks Yoyo, Yaya and the audience to use their imagination and pretend that they are going to travel to different parts of the world to look at unusual modes of transportation. They get to see a tuk tuk, jeepney, horse carriage etc. Why segment - How do you get to school? Kim, Yoyo and Yaya play a game of charades to explore the different types of transport one can use to get to school.

programme.title: In Our House S2
programme.desc: IN OUR HOUSE is full of surprises and is more interactive and energetic than you have ever seen before. In an entertaining mix of song, dance, music and drama, join the wacky hosts as they introduce the LETTERS AND NUMBERS OF THE DAY and the adventures that they encounter.

programme.title: Titipo The Little Train S3
programme.desc: Titipo is the new train in town who's just about to learn how to take passengers and live with other train and vehicle friends. He's fully ready and very excited to operate!

programme.desc: In the upcoming season, the quirky residents from all around the valley come to the Moomin family with their problems and questions, and together they harness to power of tolerance, kindness and caring to restore harmony to Moominvalley.

programme.title: Mondo Yan
programme.desc: The world has fallen into chaos and is now a stinky land of toxic cesspools and monstrous mutants, called the Chou World, run by the nasty villain Negu. High above, on top of ancient abandoned skyscrapers, a beautiful new yet fragile and harmonious world has risen: the Yan World. Protected by three eccentric Elders, three young apprentice misfits have been chosen to learn their secrets and protect this peaceful and idyllic place!

programme.desc: When an elite group of soccer players split up to join teams across the country, the group's forward joins an underdog team from a remote island to help it achieve victory in a youth tournament.

programme.title: Ultraman Z
programme.desc: Ultraman Z, the newest addition to the Intergalactic Defense Force, battles with evil forces that spread across the universe. He goes after the monster Genegarg to save Earth from destruction.

programme.title: Rio 2
programme.desc: It's a jungle out there for Blu, Jewel, and their three kids after they're hurtled from Rio de Janeiro to the wilds of the Amazon. As Blu tries to fit in, he goes beak-to-beak with the vengeful Nigel and meets his father-in-law.

programme.title: Groom My Room Too S2
programme.desc: Move over adults! It's time for kids to have their own makeover series! In Groom My Room Too, catch kids as they take charge and make their dream bedrooms a reality! Each week, one lucky kid gets to transform their room from bland to grand! But it won't be easy! Kids will have to come up with their room designs, ship, decorate and lead their room groomers to finish the makeover on time and on budget!

programme.title: Films & Stars

programme.title: Singapore Recipes For Life
programme.desc: Chef Chris and Kyle spend an afternoon at the Singapore Cricket Club, reliving dishes featured in a Christmas menu from 1938, that includes colonial concoctions like Gin Pahit and Mulligatawny. Margaret Cunico, shares memories of past NDP parades on the padang and quirks about the club. Next, the hosts meet larger than life residents of Geylang Lorong 24A, a peak into a Legendary Flamenco maestro's life, a curiosity shop and shophouses reimagined.

programme.title: Going From Broke S1
programme.desc: Dan Rosensweig, CEO of student services business Chegg, meets millennials with big dreams but are swimming in debt. Together, Rosensweig and his team advise and guide the subject of each episode to turn their financial situation around and move toward freedom from debt and student loans.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond The Lobby S2
programme.desc: Monica Galetti and Giles Coren head to the foothills of the Swiss Alps to experience a very different type of travel - health and wellness tourism. This luxury hotel houses not only multiple restaurants, spas and golf courses but also Olympic-standard sports facilities - and a high-spec clinic boasting 80 medical staff, who offer guests everything from sleep therapy to dietary advice and surgery.

Along the way they encounter dragons, dwarves, merfolk, and a band of lost warriors before reaching the edge of the world.

programme.desc: (PG)(重) 阿娣的本名叫刘招娣，60年代出世，母亲连生了几个女儿，招娣排行第四，在她之后妈妈果然生了一个弟弟，招娣就成了一个可有可无的多余货，父母养不了她，把她过继给了堂叔堂婶，堂叔只当她是个帮佣。80年代，她前后共碰上两段姻缘，结两次婚，可是很不幸的丈夫都死了，她于是继承了丈夫的一家餐馆，从此铁了心不再嫁，因缘际会，前后收留了来自不同家庭的五个儿女...

programme.title: 哆啦A梦

programme.title: Miniforce S1

programme.title: 小屋大作
programme.desc: (重) 不同年纪的女人对于房屋需求也有所不同！本周将迎来由黄嫊方饰演的贵妇姐姐和萧歆霓饰演的年轻妹妹一起来看公寓！妹妹单纯活泼、热爱新事物，姐姐要求多又爱奢华，陈汉玮饰演的房屋经纪 Barry Koo 将介绍两间风格大不同的两房式公寓，看看是否能成功说服两姐妹，顺利成交？.

programme.title: 银色嘉年华 2024

programme.title: ila 部落住一晚 S2
programme.desc: (重) 民雄将带着‘'抹茶山‘'的创作人日籍摄影作家小林贤伍 KengoKobayashi及他的旅行同好俄罗斯籍的Victor Krupenkov，一起旅行新竹县尖石乡，尖石乡秀峦村高山巨石峭壁林立，加上原始生态维护得宜，成为国人甚至国际背包客旅行的热点，巨木群、泰雅文化、水蜜桃、樱花，赛德克巴莱电影场景‘'青蛙石天空步道园区‘'这种种吸引人们前往旅行的诱因，与大城市近在咫尺，成为最显著的优势，这集里我们将看见。小林贤伍向来自日本百年水蜜桃母树致谢，体验陡峭山坡采水蜜桃的乐趣，感受在群山环抱下的悠闲唱歌情.

programme.title: 幸福方程式

programme.title: Oru Nodiyil
programme.desc: Sathais' life was riddled with challenges from the start when he lacked the basic guidance and support that every child needs. From the age of five, Sathais lost his family and lived in foster homes. Although his physical and basic needs were taken care of Sathais yearned for the attention and love of his biological parents. Years later, when his biological mother was diagnosed with breast cancer, Sathias moved into the family's home to look after her but soon after another debilitating lost...

programme.title: Oru Nodiyil
programme.desc: Age and blood ties do not define motherhood. Menaka Gopal's life changed in an instant when she had to take care of a 3 year old Preethi at the age of 51. With her own kids grown up, she was lost at how to parent again. Amidst juggling to care for a 3 year old and her ailing husband, she was devastated. Find out more on this episode of Oru Nodiyil.
